title: Scenic - Panel, "Underseas", 1935
description: Bathroom paper with fish and seaweed. Large orange and yellow fish in center, turning right. Two small fish above on either side facing left. Yellow bubbles drawn in outline on right underwater plants in foreground - two crossing, passing through center fish. Large wavy stripe topped by three other stripes. Different distances apart. Panel A. Printed on deep blue-green ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scenic - Panel, "Underseas", 1935.
1935. Chromo-lithograph. Gift of Wallpaper Council, Inc.. 1960-163-48-a,b.
